about_the_game:
Secrets of Wynne is a puzzle adventure game: journey across a mysterious island, solving puzzles and overcoming challenges while meeting the vibrant, quirky characters that populate the world.


Explore a colorful, cozy, open world filled with surprises. Every cave has something to discover, every house has someone to befriend. From peaceful farming villages to burning forests to dank caves, there's a new frontier waiting for you.


The landscape is dotted with puzzles to unravel. Some will test your observation skills, others your logic and reasoning. Wynne has code breaking, augmented reality, block pushing, word games, and other tricks for you to outwit.


Things on Wynne are not what they seem. A force prevents anyone from leaving. Creatures speak in riddles. An old race is contending with an adversary living in the shadows. Uncover the story, piecing together the clues to find one of the 3 possible endings.

Key Features

  • Open ended exploration. Discover the world on your terms.
  • Challenging puzzles that test your logic, reasoning, and observation.
  • Charming, vibrant characters.
  • 3 possible endings.

short_description: A puzzle adventure game about exploration and discovery. Wander an open world dense with surprises. Challenge your wits against puzzles of all varieties. Meet charming characters that bring personality to your travels. Use all the tools at your disposal to unravel the Secrets of Wynne.
